thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Deviation greater than 10% from the average grip force for the object
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors the force applied to grip the object.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Excessive or insufficient grip force detected through tactile feedback or sensor data.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Deviation greater than 5 cm from the intended lift height
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Measures the height at which the object is lifted relative to the target.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Measured lift height shows significant difference from the expected range.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Object shifts by more than 2 cm during pickup
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Visual or tactile feedback indicates unexpected object movement during the pickup.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Force applied exceeds 15 N for lightweight objects or less than 5 N for heavy objects
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors the force applied while lifting to ensure appropriate handling.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Abnormal force levels indicate either excessive pressure or inadequate grip.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Angle deviation greater than 10 degrees from the optimal pickup angle
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors the alignment of the tool or hand with the object.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Visual or sensor feedback shows misalignment between the tool and the object.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Movement greater than 3 cm during pickup
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Tracks object movement or instability during the lifting process.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: The object moves unexpectedly, signaling improper stabilization or poor grip.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Weight deviation greater than 20% from the expected weight
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Measures the perceived weight of the object to confirm proper lifting technique.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Unexpected weight detected, indicating either incorrect object or lifting technique.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Reach distance exceeds 1 meter or is below minimum ergonomic threshold
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Measures the distance required to reach the object before lifting.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Excessive reach detected, leading to strain or reduced lifting efficiency.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Lift speed exceeds 1 meter per second for heavy objects
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors the speed at which the object is lifted.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Excessive speed during lifting indicates rushed or unsafe behavior.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Object integrity loss greater than 10% (e.g., breakage or deformation)
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Checks for damage to the object during or after lifting.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Visible cracks or deformations indicating damage caused during the pickup process.
